original_text: For unto every one that hath shall be given, and he shall have abundance: but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath.
korean_text: 무릇 있는 자는 받아 풍족하게 되고 없는 자는 그 있는 것까지 빼앗기리라

sentences.original_text: For unto every one that hath shall be given
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 갖는 자마다 더 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: but from him that hath not
shall be taken away even that which he hath
